direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve modifying the status or state of a plan or transaction, with similar parameter handling and request patterns.
Both methods involve sending POST requests to change the state of a plan, with similar control flows and parameter checks.
Both methods handle similar types of exceptions related to parameter validation and request failures.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler to send requests.
Environment setup is required before sending requests to change plan status.
Both methods involve verifying the status change and handling similar exceptions.
